scenario.name: SIPp scenario
scenario.send: INVITE sip:[field3]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 Contact: <sip:[field1]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> To: <sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> From: "[field0]"<sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTagInvite[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Content-Type: application/sdp User-Agent: SIPp Subject: Call Performance Test made by ZouHualong Content-Length: [len] v=0 o=[field1] [pid][call_number] 8[pid][call_number]8 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=SIPp Media i=Media Data c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 101 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15,16 a=sendrecv

ACK sip:[field3]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 Contact: <sip:[field1]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> To: <sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] From: "[field0]"<sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTagInvite[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK User-Agent: SIPp Subject: Call Performance Test made by ZouHualong Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[field3]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 Contact: <sip:[field1]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> To: <sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] From: "[field0]"<sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTagInvite[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE User-Agent: SIPp Subject: Call Performance Test made by ZouHualong Content-Length: 0
